attributes.name: content
attributes.value: A new benchmark has been established for evaluating large language models (LLMs), focusing on their ability to provide accurate responses grounded in source material while minimizing hallucinations.

attributes.name: content
attributes.value: Google DeepMind has announced Gemini 2.0, an advanced multimodal AI model, alongside significant updates to video generation technologies with Veo 2 and Imagen 3, enhancing the creative capabilities of digital content creation.

attributes.name: content
attributes.value: Aligning with AI ethics, new frameworks and tools like SynthID for watermarking AI-generated media have been introduced, aimed at ensuring responsible AI usage and enhancing transparency in generative AI technology.
